about.subtitle: Hi! I'm a passionate developer who loves creating amazing web experiences.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description1: I've been in the web development world for several years, constantly learning and adapting to new technologies. My journey started with simple HTML and CSS, and has expanded to modern frameworks and tools.
journey.description2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge in the developer community.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to work together or just chat about technology!
